weather_report:
The afternoon unfolds with a gentle embrace of warmth as the sun casts its golden glow over Downtown San Francisco. The air carries a refreshing bite, invigorated by a brisk north wind that adds a playful whisper to the swaying trees. Today’s forecast speaks of clarity and serenity, with the horizon stretching out into an inviting blue that hints at the city’s famed vistas. The typical fog that dances along the coast seems to have retreated, leaving behind a gentle sigh of clear skies and a pleasant sun that warms the heart—perfect for a leisurely afternoon.

As the day inches toward its close, temperatures are set to dip gracefully, ushering in a sweet evening that cools to around fifty-five degrees. Dress comfortably yet with an eye toward the chill that may sneak up as twilight descends. A light jacket or a cozy sweater will serve you well as you stroll the streets, perhaps pausing at a favorite café to savor a warm cup of tea or coffee. The brilliance of the clear day calls for reflection or mildly spirited conversation, making this the ideal moment to explore the local parks or indulge in a quiet walk along the waterfront, breathing in the crisp air and recharging for the night ahead.
